metadata.name: Potential Mftrace.EXE Abuse
metadata.comment: Detects child processes of the "Trace log generation tool for Media Foundation Tools" (Mftrace.exe) which can abused to execute arbitrary binaries.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\mftrace.exe')))

output.summary: Detects child processes of the "Trace log generation tool for Media Foundation Tools" (Mftrace.exe) which can abused to execute arbitrary binaries.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use for tracing purposes Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Mftrace/
